function_description: Toggle subscription to own cards in 4ga Boards application.
initial_state: User is on the Preferences settings page of the 4ga Boards application with 'Subscribe to my own cards' currently set to Disabled.
steps: Locate the 'Subscribe to my own cards' section on the Preferences settings page.
Click on the toggle switch next to the 'Subscribe to my own cards' label.
expected_state: The 'Subscribe to my own cards' setting is updated to Enabled, automatically subscribing the user to any cards they create.
